trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Please enter the number of dots:] and wait set [total number of dots v] to (answer) set [bits v] to [0] set [bit value v] to [1] repeat until <(total number of dots) < (bit value)> set [bit value v] to ((bit value) * (2)) change [bits v] by (1) end say (join (join (join [You will need ] (bits)) [ bits to store number ]) (total number of dots))
